definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Tian1 zhu3 jiao4 Ai4 guo2 hui4

definition: Three-Self Patriotic Movement, PRC government-sanctioned Protestant church from 1949
pinyin: San1 zi4 Ai4 guo2 Jiao4 hui4

definition: May Fourth Movement/Chinese national renewal movement that started with 4th May 1919 protest against the Treaty of Versailles
pinyin: wu3 si4 ai4 guo2 yun4 dong4

definition: to love one's country as one's own family (praise for a virtuous ruler)

pinyin: Ai4 guo2 Wei4 sheng1 Yun4 dong4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

sentences.english: This strain of popular discourse and feeling in China is more patriotic than nationalistic.
sentences.chinese: 这种感觉与其说是民族主义不如说是爱国心。

sentences.english: General Zhang Xueliang is a typical representative of patriotism in modern Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 张学良将军是中国近现代史上爱国主义的典型代表。

sentences.english: "Other patriots" refers primarily to the enlightened gentry.
sentences.chinese: 所说的“其他爱国人士”，则主要地是指的开明绅士。

sentences.english: In addition, he turned the justice anti-invasion war into absurdly indiscriminate rejection of everything foreign.
sentences.chinese: 把正义的反侵略的爱国主义变成了荒谬的盲目排外。

sentences.english: Lu You was a famous patriotic poet in the Southern Song Dyansty .
sentences.chinese: 陆游诗南宋著名的爱国诗人。

sentences.english: Peter H. L. Chang's viewpoint of national unity is an important part of his patriotism.
sentences.chinese: 张学良的国家统一思想是其爱国主义的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: The old man is a patriotic overseas Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 这位老人是一位爱国华侨。

sentences.english: I met some of these patriotic Americans at Fort Campbell.
sentences.chinese: 我在坎贝尔堡见到了这些爱国的美国志士。

sentences.english: During the Second World War the béret became a symbol of French Patriotism.
sentences.chinese: 到了二战期间，贝雷帽成为法国人爱国的标志。
承办其它爱国卫生工作。
他是个热忱的爱国志士。

sentences.english: And the attachment to the country mainly manifests in patriotic like family.
sentences.chinese: 对国家的依恋集中体现在爱国如家心态上。

sentences.english: They also put forward proletariate internationalism and patriotism.
sentences.chinese: 提出了无产阶级的国际主义和爱国主义的观点。

sentences.english: In other words, if a man loves his country, he must love the national flag.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，假如一小我私纪猱国，他必需爱国旗。

sentences.english: He is imbued with feelings of patriotism.
China's tourist hotspots are hoping to capitalize on this homebody spirit.
sentences.chinese: 中国的旅游热点地区正希望借助这股爱国热情。

definition: angry youth/positive term used to describe young Chinese with extreme nationalistic tendencies/see also 糞青|粪青[fen4 qing1]
to dedicate oneself to the service of one's country

nationalism/national self-determination/principle of nationalism, the first of Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People 三民主義|三民主义 (at the time, meaning parity between China and the great powers)/racism
The rise and fall of the nation concerns everyone (idiom). Everyone bears responsibility for the prosperity of society.
pinyin: tian1 xia4 xing1 wang2 , pi3 fu1 you3 ze2

definition: guard home, defend the country (idiom); national defense
to resist Japan (esp. during WW2)/anti-Japanese (esp. wartime activities)
innate sense of right and wrong/conscience/bosom friend
